docs.text: Python Book Creation tools Tools I use for writing Python books. Installation If you are only using validate_output.py you do not need to pip install this package, but just include it in your project. Slugline The "Slug Line" (a term from journalism) not only tells the reader which file this is, it also enables update_markdown_code_listings.py to update the code listing in the book from the source file. Automatically adds the commented file name at the top of each Python file, in the form: #: file_name.py If the slug line does not exist it is added. If it exists and is incorrect it is corrected. If it exists and is correct, no changes are made. Changes are reported by the program. Run python slug_line.py -h for details on how to use it.
